partintro.title: Document structure
partintro.para: This part of the reference documentation explains the functionality that Spring Hadoop (SHDP) provides Spring Batch based applications. This integration enables Hadoop related tasks to become executable components within a Spring Batch job.
describes the Spring Batch support for bootstrapping, initializing and working with core Hadoop.
describes the Spring Batch support for HBase.
describes the Spring Batch support for Hive.
describes the Spring Batch support for Pig.
